alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips County through 645 PM MDT... At 548 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Malta, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
